text: @realDonaldTrump So what happened to the white house trying to get the "Real" Covid19 numbers that didn't include comorbidities, car accident, or "suspected cases" and what happened to Fraud Waste & Abuse? I used to have retake course every year and yet the hospitals can code "suspected" covid?!?
